data.title: Food Truck Tracker: Here’s What Food Trucks in the Area are Doing
data.meta_description: HISTORIC TRIANGLE — Several food trucks from the Historic Triangle continue to serve culinary creations throughout the community. From breweries, distilleries…
data.text:
HISTORIC TRIANGLE — Several food trucks from the Historic Triangle continue to serve culinary creations throughout the community.

From breweries, distilleries, and vineyards, here’s where you can find local food truck operators the weekend of August 2-4.

We want to hear from you! Do you have a food truck or know of one in the area that you think should be included in our weekly Food Truck Tracker? Send us an email at Info@WYDaily.com to let us know!

Abuelita’s

Friday: Fort Eustis Main Exchange, 1386 Washington Blvd. in Fort Eustis, 11 a.m.–1:30 p.m.

Avocargo

Saturday: Fuse Fest, 700 East Olney Road in Norfolk, noon–7 p.m.

Sunday: Benchtop Brewing, 1129 Boissevain Ave. in Norfolk, noon–4 p.m.

Bald Guys Pies

Friday: New Kent Winery, 8400 Old Church Road in New Kent, 5:30–9 p.m.

Saturday: Toano Open Air Market, 7891 Richmond Road, 9 a.m.–noon

BLZN Tacos

Friday: Coastal Fermentory, 206 23rd St. in Newport News, 11:30 a.m.–8 p.m.

Saturday: Coastal Fermentory, 206 23rd St. in Newport News, 11:30 a.m.–8 p.m.

Bones and BBQ

Sunday: Alewerks Brewing Co., 189B Ewell Road, 4–8 p.m.

Coastal Thirst

Saturday: Yorktown Market Days Food and Artisans Market, 401 Water St. in Yorktown, 8 a.m.–noon; Hampton Roads Harley-Davidson, 6450 George Washington Memorial Highway in Yorktown, 9 a.m.–3 p.m.

Dominion Dogs

Friday: U.S. Coast Guard Training Center Yorktown, U.S. Coast Guard Training Center, 1 in Yorktown, 11 a.m.–3 p.m.; Frothy Moon Brewhouse, 1826 Jamestown Road, 4–8 p.m.

Saturday: Virginia Living Museum, 524 J Clyde Morris Blvd. in Newport News, 11 a.m.–3 p.m.

Sunday: Lifepointe Christian Church, 8841 Richmond Road, 11 a.m.–1 p.m.

Don Chido

Friday: Billsburg Brewery, 2054 Jamestown Road, 11 a.m.–8 p.m.

Saturday: Billsburg Brewery, 2054 Jamestown Road, 11 a.m.–8 p.m.; Alewerks Brewing Co., 189B Ewell Road, 4–8 p.m.

Sunday: Lifepointe Christian Church, 8841 Richmond Road, 12:15–2:15 p.m.; Grandview neighborhood, 100 Grandview Drive in Hampton, 4–7 p.m.

Flame and Pie

Friday: 1700 Brewing, 11838 Canon Blvd. #400 in Newport News, 5–8 p.m.

The Hungry Pug

Tuesday through Friday: Frothy Moon Brewhouse, 1826 Jamestown Road, 8 a.m.–noon; Fraternal Order of Eagles, 113 Palace Lane #N, 5–9 p.m.

Kirbside Dawgs and Hawgs

Monday: Alewerks Brewing Co., 189B Ewell Road, 4–8 p.m.

Thursday: Alewerks Brewing Co., 189B Ewell Road, 4–8 p.m.

The Knockout

Friday: Virginia Beer Company, 401 Second St., noon–9 p.m.

Lodschgi

Friday: Hampton University Proton Cancer Institute, 40 Enterprise Parkway in Hampton, 11 a.m.–2 p.m.; Tradition Brewing, 700 Thimble Shoals Blvd. in Newport News, 4–8:30 p.m.

Nomads

Friday: Tradition Brewing, 700 Thimble Shoals Blvd. in Newport News, 4–8:30 p.m.

Saturday: Copper Fox Distillery, 901 Capitol Landing Road, noon–7 p.m.

Sunday: Frothy Moon Brewhouse, 1826 Jamestown Road, noon–2 p.m.

Old City BBQ

Saturday: Frothy Moon Brewhouse, 1826 Jamestown Road, noon–8 p.m.

Piha Aloha

Saturday: Alewerks Brewing Co., 189B Ewell Road, 3–8 p.m.

The Scottish Pig

Friday: Saude Creek Vineyards, 16230 Cooks Mill Road, 4–8 p.m.

Saturday: Saude Creek Vineyards, 16230 Cooks Mill Road, noon–5 p.m.

Sunday: Saude Creek Vineyards, 16230 Cooks Mill Road, noon–5 p.m.

Sum’em Different

Sunday: Copper Fox Distillery, 901 Capitol Landing Road, noon–5 p.m.

Tin Tub

Friday: Alewerks Brewing Co., 189B Ewell Road, 4–8 p.m.

Vivi’s Burritos

Sunday: Virginia Beer Company, 401 Second St., noon–9 p.m.

The Wandering Sausage

Saturday: Virginia Beer Company, 401 Second St., noon–9:30 p.m.

Here’s what your favorite Williamsburg breweries and distilleries are offering:

Alewerks Brewing Company

Alewerks is hosting live music on Friday and Saturday. They are also hosting a Child Development Resources fundraiser on Saturday.

Friday: Tin Tub

Saturday: Don Chido

Sunday: Bones & BBQ

Billsburg Brewery

Billsburg is hosting SpeedQuizzing on Friday and live music on Saturday.

Friday: Don Chido

Saturday: Don Chido

Sunday through Thursday: Waterfront Grill, 11 a.m.-8 p.m.

Friday and Saturday: Waterfront Grill, 11 a.m.-9 p.m.

Copper Fox Distillery

Copper Fox offers behind-the-scenes tours at 1 p.m. and 3 p.m. every Friday, Saturday and Sunday with no reservation necessary for parties of six and under.

Saturday: Nomads — delicious international cuisine

Sunday: Sum’em Different — a wide variety of favorites like fried rice, seafood pasta and more

Frothy Moon Brewhouse

Frothy Moon is hosting live music on Saturday.

Friday: The Hungry Pug; Dominion Dogs

Saturday: Old City BBQ

Sunday: Nomads

Virginia Beer Company

There will be live music all weekend at VBC.
